text: 'in trjea (hfst weaysh) 'iilaa allah faqad wujd mnkma ma ywjb altawbat hayth malt qulubukuma 'iilaa mahabatan ma krhh rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wslm, min 'ifsha' srrih, wa'iin tteawna ealayh bima ysw'h, fa'iina allah waliuh wnasrh, wajibril wasalih almwmnyn, walmalayikat baed nsrt allah 'aewan lah wnsra' ealaa man ywdhyh wyeadyh
